short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your new tab page to show a countdown to your next deadline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to customize a running Countdown in days and 7 decimals that will replace your new tab . Very useful to put pressure and remind yourself of how fast time runs.
